attributes.action: Investigate every MP's expenses and prosecute all  who have made fraudelent claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is ample evidence that many MP's, on both side of the house have made fraudulent claims for expenses.

There is a difference between these fraudsters and those who make fraudulent benefit claims, these MP's are legislators and their fraud is due to greed and not neccessity.
